00050     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00051     // Creation and Deletion functions
00052     ///////////////////////////////////
00053     GraphicsSettings::GraphicsSettings()
00054     {
00055         Construct(640,480,false);
00056     }
00057 
00058     GraphicsSettings::GraphicsSettings( const Whole &Width_, const Whole &Height_, const bool &FullScreen_ )
00059     {
00060         Construct( Width_, Height_, FullScreen_ );
00061     }
00062 
00063     void GraphicsSettings::Construct( const Whole &Width_, const Whole &Height_, const bool &FullScreen_ )
00064     {
00065         this->Fullscreen = FullScreen_;
00066         this->RenderHeight = Height_;
00067         this->RenderWidth = Width_;
00068     }
00069 
00070 
00071     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00072     // Fullscreen functions
00073     ///////////////////////////////////
00074     bool GraphicsSettings::getFullscreen() const
00075     {
00076         return this->Fullscreen;
00077     }
00078 
00079     //returns: false if changes could not be made
00080     void GraphicsSettings::setFullscreen(const bool &Fullscreen_)
00081     {
00082         /// @todo TODO: We really should double check that going into fullscreen worked the way we wanted, this fails in too many games
00083         this->Fullscreen = Fullscreen_;
00084     }
00085 
00086     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00087     // Resolution functions
00088     ///////////////////////////////////
00089     Whole GraphicsSettings::getRenderHeight() const
00090     {
00091         return this->RenderHeight;
00092     }
00093 
00094     Whole GraphicsSettings::getRenderWidth() const
00095     {
00096         return this->RenderWidth;
00097     }
00098 
00099     void GraphicsSettings::setRenderHeight(const Whole &Height_)
00100     {
00101         this->RenderHeight = Height_;
00102     }
00103 
00104     void GraphicsSettings::setRenderWidth(const Whole &Width_)
00105     {
00106         this->RenderWidth = Width_;
00107     }
